content: OK, Who do you think will win the NCAA basketball "Big Dance". My money in on Uconn for both mens and womens. Especailly the women who are undefeated at 33 - 0 regular season. They also may hold a record never held before. A undefeated season of beating the other teams by 10 or more points per game.

content: if pitt makes it to the final vs uconn, they'll beat them up just like the two previous times this season. both of those teams count on physicality and intimidation. But Pitt's got a history of choking in the big show, and if they go up against a good shooting team that they can't muscle around in the key, they'll get upset before the sweet sixteen.
